panels.description: cls = ${cls}. Used as an unique cluster identifier and resource namespace.
panels.title: Cluster

panels.description: ins = ${ins}, used as unique instance identifier. Formed as {{ cls }}-{{ seq }}.
panels.title: Instance

panels.description: Time spent on executing statements  during last 1 hour
panels.title: Statement Time Spent 1h

panels.description: Pgbouncer Queries per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Pgbouncer query average response time in last 1m, 5m, 15m

targets.expr: increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])
increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])
increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.title: RT

panels.description: Average Response time in last 15 minute (offset 8min)
panels.title: RT  (Dist 15m Offset 8m)

targets.expr: increase(pg_query_rows{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])
increase(pg_query_rows{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])
increase(pg_query_rows{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])
increase(pg_query_wal_bytes{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])
increase(pg_query_wal_bytes{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])
increase(pg_query_wal_bytes{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.description: Time spent on executing statements  during last 1 hour
panels.title: Statement Time Spent 1h

panels.description: number of statement call in last 1 hour
panels.title: Statement Call 1h

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
